welcome_message_body: Welcome to Gaithersburg, a charming city known for its historic charm, beautiful parks, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Gaithersburg has to offer during your visit!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse Z
terminals.description: Concourse Z at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by selecting 'Tipton Airport WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport is exclusively for private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
